        public <T> boolean register(Class<T> aClass,
                   Encoder<T> encoder)
        This will override any existing encoder associated with the given class
        Type Parameters:
        T - the Type that will be encoded
        Parameters:
        aClass - the class type that can be encoded by this encoder
        encoder - the Encoder that can serialise this class
